fn.p: Farzin Shabani conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Lalit Kumar contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Rashid Hamdan Saif al Shidi contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
